name: Washed Up!
description: Blocks are washing up on the beaches of your pristine atoll, deploy your crab helpers to tidy them up before they pollute everything! Take blocks from the beach and arrange them into squares in the middle to score points and keep your beaches clean.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any DX10 compatible DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space
